TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonSplitButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class RibbonSplitButton Inherits RibbonMenuButton Implements ICommandSource
type RibbonSplitButton = class inherit RibbonMenuButton interface ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示複合控制項，此控制項具有回應 事件的主按鈕和顯示互斥值下拉清單的輔助按鈕。

span.span: Represents a composite control that has a primary button that responds to a event and a secondary button that displays a drop-down list of mutually exclusive values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示的範例控制項在大型、 中型和小型的變化，以及使用任何映像。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能區分割按鈕控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項")![Ribbon split button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "Ribbon split button controls") 功能區分割按鈕控制項Ribbon split button controls 下列圖例顯示控制項下拉式清單開啟時。The following illustrations show controls when the drop-down is opened. ![功能區分割按鈕控制項拖放-下開放](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項下拉式清單開啟的狀態")![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區分割按鈕控制項Ribbon split button control with drop-down open ![功能區分割按鈕控制項拖放-下開放](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "功能區分割按鈕控制項下拉式清單開啟的狀態")![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") 開啟下拉式功能表的功能區分割按鈕控制項Ribbon split button control with drop-down open ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用三個可用的項目中建立分割按鈕的標記。The following example shows the markup to create a split button with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonSplitButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonsplitbutton)]

summary.span: 取得或設定此控制項標題區域的鍵盤快速鍵。

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且不得包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 按鍵提示有時也稱為存取金鑰或加速器，用來作為啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按鍵提示會出現在當您按 ALT 鍵。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
